statements: SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, purchase_date FROM warranty_and_service_history;
SELECT * FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE warranty_period > 1;
SELECT appliance_name, warranty_period FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT appliance_id, service_history FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE appliance_name = 'Microwave';
SELECT appliance_name, COUNT(appliance_id) AS total_appliances FROM warranty_and_service_history GROUP BY appliance_name;
SELECT appliance_name, warranty_period FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE purchase_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY warranty_period DESC;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, purchase_date FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE warranty_period >= 2 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT appliance_name, warranty_period FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE warranty_period < 3 ORDER BY appliance_name;
SELECT * FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE service_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, warranty_period, purchase_date FROM warranty_and_service_history WHERE appliance_name LIKE '%fridge%' ORDER BY appliance_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT appliance_id, warranty_start_date FROM warranty_information WHERE appliance_id = 1;
SELECT appliance_id, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appliance_id, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information ORDER BY warranty_end_date DESC;

SELECT sh.service_id, sh.appliance_id, sh.service_date, sh.service_description, wi.warranty_start_date, wi.warranty_end_date FROM service_history sh LEFT JOIN warranty_information wi ON sh.appliance_id = wi.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE appliance_id = 1;
SELECT warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information WHERE appliance_id = 2;
SELECT appliance_id, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information ORDER BY warranty_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_history WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT service_description, service_date FROM service_history WHERE appliance_id = 1 ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WarrantyInfo;
SELECT brand, model, purchase_date FROM ApplianceDetails ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_id, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM WarrantyInfo WHERE warranty_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_id, service_date, service_details FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT appliance_id, brand, model, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM ApplianceDetails JOIN WarrantyInfo ON ApplianceDetails.appliance_id = WarrantyInfo.appliance_id;
SELECT brand, model, purchase_date FROM ApplianceDetails;
SELECT service_id, appliance_id, service_date, service_details FROM ServiceHistory ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT brand, model, purchase_date FROM ApplianceDetails WHERE brand = 'Samsung' AND purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WarrantyInfo LEFT JOIN ApplianceDetails ON WarrantyInfo.appliance_id = ApplianceDetails.appliance_id;
SELECT brand, COUNT(*) as total_appliances FROM ApplianceDetails GROUP BY brand ORDER BY total_appliances DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, warranty_period FROM smart_appliances WHERE warranty_period > 1;
SELECT appliance_name, purchase_date FROM smart_appliances ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, service_description FROM smart_appliances JOIN service_history ON smart_appliances.appliance_id = service_history.appliance_id;
SELECT appliance_name, start_date, end_date FROM smart_appliances JOIN warranty_info ON smart_appliances.appliance_id = warranty_info.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, purchase_date FROM smart_appliances ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, warranty_period FROM smart_appliances WHERE warranty_period > 2;
SELECT sa.appliance_name, wh.warranty_provider FROM smart_appliances sa JOIN warranty_info wh ON sa.appliance_id = wh.appliance_id;
SELECT sh.service_id, sh.service_date, sa.appliance_name, t.full_name FROM service_history sh JOIN smart_appliances sa ON sh.appliance_id = sa.appliance_id JOIN technician t ON t.technician_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM warranty_info;
SELECT appliance_name, serial_number, purchase_date FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_period > 2;
SELECT brand, model_number FROM appliance_details WHERE year_of_manufacture < 2015;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM warranty_terms WHERE warranty_description ILIKE '%extended%';
SELECT * FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_period > 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, serial_number, purchase_date FROM warranty_info WHERE appliance_name LIKE 'Fridge%';

SELECT ci.customer_name, ci.customer_email, ah.appliance_name, wh.warranty_name FROM customer_info ci JOIN appliance_details ah ON ci.customer_id = ah.appliance_id JOIN warranty_terms wh ON ah.appliance_id = wh.warranty_id WHERE ci.customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT sh.service_id, ad.appliance_name, sh.service_date, sh.service_description FROM service_history sh JOIN appliance_details ad ON sh.appliance_id = ad.appliance_id WHERE ad.brand = 'Samsung';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appliances FROM appliance_details;
